changeSet.author: hparry
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.relationship_network ( id bigserial NOT NULL, parent bigserial NOT NULL, child bigserial NOT NULL, description character varying, notes character varying, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, pinned boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, is_transitive boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, operator ruleform.relational_operator, CONSTRAINT relationship_network_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT parent_fkey FOREIGN KEY (parent) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT child_fkey FOREIGN KEY (child) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT relationship_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
